Class JSONUtils

com.suganya.utils.JSONUtils
public final class JSONUtils extends Object
Utility class to handle data reading operations from JSON file

  • Method Details

    • getJsonDataToMap

      public static List<Map<String,String>> getJsonDataToMap(String filePath)
      Method to read data from JSON file

      If any exception occurs, it is caught and accordingly either InvalidDataFilePathException or InputDataException is thrown

      Parameters:
      filePath - Path of JSON file to be read
      Returns:
      List of Hashmap containing the data read from JSON file in the form of key-value pairs i.e., List<Map<String, String>>
